dizzy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: feeling unable to stand steadily, for example because you are looking down from a high place or because you are ill
dizzy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The heat and the champagne made him feel dizzy.
She started to suffer from dizzy spells (=a short period when you feel dizzy).
dizzy.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Hong Kong buzzes from dawn to dusk at a dizzy pace.
